data.lyric:
[ti:abcdefu (Explicit)]
[ar:Gayle]
[al:abcdefu (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]abcdefu (Explicit) - Gayle
[00:00.89]Lyrics by：David Bruce Pittenger/Sara Davis/Taylor Gayle Rutherfurd
[00:01.79]F**k you and your mom and your sister and your job
[00:05.51]And your broke a*s car and that s**t you call art
[00:09.46]F**k you and your friends that I'll never see again
[00:13.37]Everybody but your dog you can all f**k off
[00:18.23]I swear I meant to mean the best when it ended
[00:22.23]Even tried to bite my tongue when you start s**t
[00:26.17]Now you're textin' all my friends asking questions
[00:29.37]They never even liked you in the first place
[00:34.05]Dated a girl that I hate for the attention
[00:37.69]She only made it two days what a connection
[00:41.72]It's like you'd do anything for my affection
[00:45.14]You're goin' all about it in the worst ways
[00:49.23]
[00:49.73]I was into you but I'm over it now
[00:54.69]And I was tryin' to be nice
[00:57.49]But nothing's getting through so let me spell it out
[01:02.28]A B C D E F U
[01:05.58]And your mom and your sister and your job
[01:08.48]And your broke a*s car and that s**t you call art
[01:12.41]F**k you and your friends that I'll never see again
[01:16.35]Everybody but your dog you can all f**k off
[01:20.38]
[01:21.44]Nah nah nah nah nah nah nah
[01:25.71]A B C D E F U
[01:28.82]You said you just needed space and so I gave it
[01:32.92]When I had nothin' to say you couldn't take it
[01:36.87]Told everyone I'm a b***h so I became it
[01:40.47]Always had to put yourself above me
[01:44.84]I was into you but I'm over it now
[01:49.79]And I was tryin' to be nice
[01:52.69]But nothing's getting through so let me spell it out
[01:57.34]A B C D E F U
[02:00.59]And your mom and your sister and your job
[02:03.55]And your craigslist couch and the way your voice sounds
[02:07.50]F**k you and your friends that I'll never see again
[02:11.41]Everybody but your dog you can all f**k off
[02:15.73]
[02:16.95]Nah nah nah nah nah nah nah
[02:20.78]A B C D E F U
[02:24.70]Nah nah nah nah nah nah nah
[02:28.58]A B C D E F U
[02:32.02]And your mom and your sister and your job
[02:35.09]And your broke a*s car and that s**t you call art
[02:39.09]F**k you and your friends that I'll never see again
[02:43.18]Everybody but your dog you can all f**k off
data.trans:
[ti:abcdefu (Explicit)]
[ar:Gayle]
[al:abcdefu (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.89]//
[00:01.79]我要诅咒你 你的母亲 你的姐姐 还有你的工作
[00:05.51]你那辆破车 还有被你自诩为艺术的垃圾
[00:09.46]我要诅咒你 还有你那些我永远不会再见的朋友
[00:13.37]除了你的狗 你们所有人都可以下地狱了
[00:18.23]我发誓我们分手的时候 我有意好聚好散
[00:22.23]就算你开始对我泼脏水 我也尽量忍气吞声
[00:26.17]现在你挨个发短信给我的朋友质问
[00:29.37]他们从一开始就没有喜欢过你
[00:34.05]你和一个我连看都不想看的女孩约会
[00:37.69]她只跟你好了两天 真是天作之合呢
[00:41.72]你装得好像为了我的爱 赴汤蹈火都在所不辞
[00:45.14]你做什么都是以最糟糕的方式
[00:49.23]
[00:49.73]我曾为你深陷爱河 但我已经放下了
[00:54.69]我曾努力对你友善相待
[00:57.49]但一切都不顺心 那就让我畅所欲言吧
[01:02.28]//
[01:05.58]诅咒你的母亲 你的姐姐 还有你的工作
[01:08.48]你那辆破车 还有被你自诩为艺术的垃圾
[01:12.41]诅咒你 还有你那些我永远不会再见的朋友
[01:16.35]除了你的狗 你们所有人都可以下地狱了
[01:20.38]
[01:21.44]//
[01:25.71]//
[01:28.82]你说你就是需要一点空间 所以我给你了
[01:32.92]在我无话可说的时候 你却不能接受
[01:36.87]昭告天下说我是个坏女人 那我就如你所愿
[01:40.47]你总想把自己的地位放在我之上
[01:44.84]我曾为你深陷爱河 但我已经放下了
[01:49.79]我曾努力对你友善相待
[01:52.69]但一切都不顺心 那就让我畅所欲言吧
[01:57.34]//
[02:00.59]诅咒你的母亲 你的姐姐 还有你的工作
[02:03.55]你的烂沙发 还有你难听的声音
[02:07.50]诅咒你 还有你那些我永远不会再见的朋友
[02:11.41]除了你的狗 你们所有人都可以下地狱了
[02:15.73]
[02:16.95]//
[02:20.78]//
[02:24.70]//
[02:28.58]//
[02:32.02]诅咒你的母亲 你的姐姐 还有你的工作
[02:35.09]你那辆破车 还有被你自诩为艺术的垃圾
[02:39.09]诅咒你 还有你那些我永远不会再见的朋友
[02:43.18]除了你的狗 你们所有人都可以下地狱了
